alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Yalobusha (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 5:28PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Yalobusha and west central Calhoun Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 528 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Scobey, or 11 miles south of George Payne State Park, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Water Valley, Coffeeville, Velma, Scobey, Oakland, Spearman, Bryant, Benwood, Pine Valley, Tillatoba, Skuna, Gums and Tyson. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
